name: Escape the TV!
description:
Hello everyone from two guys who really like video games.

It's our first participation to a Jam and our first collaboration on a project, that was a great experience and we hope you will like our game.

What's the game? A guy has been ate by his TV and he try to escape, you can help him by zapping between 3 TV channels, changing barriers position.

Commands:
Move with WASD or arrow keys, zap with alpha keys (1, 2 and 3).

Good luck and have fun!
